title: Lokayat Demonetisation Marathi and Hindi booklets are out
subtitle: Lokayat publishes Hindi and Marathi version of demonetisation booklet.
content: Lokayat and Janta Trust publishes Hindi and Marathi version of demonetisation booklet. It contains an important section on the role of the USA: the latest material reveals that the Modi Government had entered into an agreement with the USA for this push towards a cashless society, and that big payment corporations - like Mastercard and Visa, are behind this.
